name: Gabriel G
description: Hi there, I am Gabriel by name ,I am 57 years old,I work with theUnited States Construction .And I have been into the Company For Over 17 Years, and i enjoyed it because due to the job i have visited so many countries although it was basically for roads and Keeping…rnI’m a widower and open for a serious relationship…. I am a sexy, loyal,romantic and devoted man who’s looking for a woman to please me.Someone to share personal moments with, enjoy life and to firmly hold the blessings of a lasting and undying happiness. I am one man born to please not to tease. I am educated with high goals, morals, and integrity. I am a once in a life time offer, every woman’s dream. I am willing to relocate to a secure foundation a steady relationship and to meet the terms,now I’m looking for a woman who’s open minded to have correspondence with.
